DISPLAY OPERATION Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 Display Units Pro Line Fusion® Avionics

bottom quarters of DU2R are referred to as DU2R Upper and DU2R Lower, respectively.

The normal window conﬁguration is shown below:

Figure 7-1 Normal Window Conﬁguration

The following formats are available in full size MFW:

• Navigation map with route and Vertical Situation Display (VSD) sub-windows

• Terminal Chart

• Document Reader.

The following are available in half-size MFW:

• Navigation map with route or VSD subwindow

• FMS pages

• Maintenance

• Document Reader

• ACARS / CPDLC

• Terminal Chart.

The following are available in quarter-size MFW:

• Synoptic Displays

• Checklist

5th Edition 7-2 02 APR 19

Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 DISPLAY OPERATION Pro Line Fusion® Avionics Display Units

• Radio Tuning

• Surveillance Video

• Graphical Weather

• SATCOM.

The following graphics show the interaction between the QAK and the resulting information available in each MFW/DU. Refer to the DU Reversion section of this chapter for location of each MFW following screen loss and reversion status.
